S2 The Expanse

Premieres 2017

Hundreds of years in the future, humans have colonized the solar system. The U.N. controls Earth. Mars is an independent military power. The planets rely on the resources of the Asteroid Belt, where air and water are more precious than gold. For decades, tensions have been rising between these three places. Earth, Mars and the Belt are now on the brink of war. And all it will take is a single spark.

S2 Dark Matter

Premiered July 01, 2016

The crew of a derelict spaceship is awakened from stasis with no memories of who they are or how they got on board. Facing threats at every turn - and the realization that they were wanted criminals pre-amnesia - they have to work together to survive a voyage charged with vengeance, betrayal and hidden secrets.

S2 Bates Motel

 

The teenage years of Norman Bates from Alfred Hitchcock's "Psycho."
